channel.title: Pbscape, Re-Rising of Delta
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/1izkoi.png[/img]
[b]Info[/b]: Server Name: Pbscape Server based off of: Deltascape Owners: Pblord7.
[b]Goals[/b]: -Very stable server -Have a decent player average -Great Economy -Fun to play server -Very few glitches
[b]What's been fixed and added?[/b]: [code] Dicing POS Perfect Hotkeys More PKing things like (items not moving when equip, etc.) 602 emotes, gfx, and item header Colored Yell Colored Talk Fixing PVP timers Fixing Ice Barrage Make Slayer easier Spirit Shields Donator Island Angel Wings for Donators (use with ::fly) Colored Talk New Death Cape Void Mele Helm Void Range Helm Void Mage Helm Void Top Void Bottom Dragon Claws Spec Crossbow Emote AGS Spec BGS Spec ZGS Spec SGS Spec Overloads Rocktails Karil's Bow on NPC's Staff Of Light Magic in PVP/NPCS(while attacking) Fix magic (can cast on any levels) Dragon Bow Glitch Fix Overload Effect Black Mask (Works just like Rune scape and help's a lot during Slayer Tasks.) PVP Drops DFS Effect DDS Glitch Fix Bank Pins Prayer Curses X2 XP System for Double EXP Weekends You attack NPC's before they attack you Elemental Staff's don't use runes "Magic Staff" doesn't use runes Rocktail Effect Torva Effect (for when Torva is added) DDS Hits twice at the same time PKing Skill Kill Death Ratio Quick Chat for Skills Redid Slayer Anti-Leak for staff, Admins+ can not view Heriqun's shop so they can not leak Just coded NPC Hitting with dds (hitting both times) Heriqun now buys Spirit Beast head for 20M. New Clue Scrolls Spirit Shield Effects PVP Spirit Shield Effects PVM 99 PKing Store NPC Freezing DDoS, Flood, and SysiPKer Protection Buy X Perfect Grim Reaper on death, based off the one from Sinzscape, we just made it 100x better HP Glitch causing you not to die. Inferno Adze with randomly buring logs. Suggesting System Ring of Wealth
Range Dupe Food Dupe Bank Dupe Combat Dupe Drop Dupe Pvp Dupe Trade Dupe Cheat Client Dupe Trade Disconnect Dupe NPC Drop Dupe [/code]
[b]Media:[/b] Mage Following: [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/9062/100magefollow.gif[/img] Mele Following: [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/8854/100meleefollow.gif[/img] Range Following: [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/780/100rangefollow.gif[/img] Spirit Shields: [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/4129/allspiritshields.gif[/img] AGS Spec: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/6xvtyu.gif[/img] BGS Spec: [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/j9ykx5.gif[/img] SGS Spec: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2555emb.gif[/img] ZGS Spec: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/27y6gee.gif[/img] Saradomin Sword Spec: [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/ev0vgy.gif[/img] Dragon Claws Spec: [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/24osm68.gif[/img] Anchor Spec: [img]http://www.gifninja.com/animatedgifs/85349/pbscape-anchor.gif[/img] Highscores: [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/7852/39963636.png[/img] Wilderness Obelisks: [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/214oxmf.jpg[/img] DDS Spec on NPCS: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/fbfbra.png[/img]
[b]Forums: Pbscape.net[/b] [b]Youtube: [url=http://www.youtube.com/subscribe_button?ch=BrokenRiver1&bl=ncount&hl=en&action_render_pop=1] BrokenRiver1[/url][/b] [b]Webclient: [url=http://playpbs.tk]Pbscape Webclient[/url][/b]
- Pblord7 [/center]

item.title: Pbscape, Re-Rising of Delta
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[center]

Info:
Server Name: Pbscape
Server based off of: Deltascape
Owners: Pblord7.

Goals:
-Very stable server
-Have a decent player average
-Great Economy
-Fun to play server
-Very few glitches

What’s been fixed and added?:

Dicing
POS
Perfect Hotkeys
More PKing things like (items not moving when equip, etc.)
602 emotes, gfx, and item header
Colored Yell
Colored Talk
Fixing PVP timers
Fixing Ice Barrage
Make Slayer easier
Spirit Shields
Donator Island
Angel Wings for Donators (use with ::fly)

New Death Cape
Void Mele Helm
Void Range Helm
Void Mage Helm

Magic in PVP/NPCS(while attacking)
Fix magic (can cast on any levels)
Dragon Bow Glitch Fix
Overload Effect
Black Mask (Works just like Rune scape and help's a lot during Slayer Tasks.)
PVP Drops
DFS Effect
DDS Glitch Fix
Bank Pins
Prayer Curses
X2 XP System for Double EXP Weekends
You attack NPC's before they attack you
Elemental Staff's don't use runes
"Magic Staff" doesn't use runes
Rocktail Effect
Torva Effect (for when Torva is added)
DDS Hits twice at the same time
PKing Skill
Kill Death Ratio
Quick Chat for Skills
Redid Slayer
Anti-Leak for staff, Admins+ can not view Heriqun's shop so they can not leak
Just coded NPC Hitting with dds (hitting both times)
Heriqun now buys Spirit Beast head for 20M.
New Clue Scrolls
Spirit Shield Effects PVP
Spirit Shield Effects PVM
99 PKing Store
NPC Freezing
DDoS, Flood, and SysiPKer Protection
Buy X
Perfect Grim Reaper on death, based off the one from Sinzscape, we just made it 100x better 
HP Glitch causing you not to die.
Inferno Adze with randomly buring logs.
Suggesting System
